thread.title: Here's how to watch Cubs-Mets NLCS Game 2
thread.title_full: Here's how to watch Cubs-Mets NLCS Game 2

title: Here's how to watch Cubs-Mets NLCS Game 2
text:
Here's how to watch Cubs-Mets NLCS Game 2 Here's how to watch Cubs-Mets NLCS Game 2 
Oct 17, 2015; New York City, NY, USA; A general view during the playing of the national anthem before game one of the NLCS between the Chicago Cubs and the New York Mets at Citi Field. (Brad Penner/USA Today Sports) Like Sports News on Facebook: reviewjournal.com 
The National League Championship Series between the Chicago Cubs and the New York Mets continues today with Game 2 at Citi Field in Flushing New York. 
The Mets lead the series 1-0 after beating the Cubs 4-2 last night. 
Here's everything you need to know if you want to catch the game. 
Time: 5:07 p.m. PDT 
TV: TBS (DirecTV 247, Cox 7, Century Link 113, Dish 139) 
Online: MLB.com (subscription required) 
Schedule through Game 7 (all times PDT): 
Game 3: Mets at Cubs — Tuesday, Oct. 20, 5:07 p.m. — TBS 
Game 4: Mets at Cubs — Wednesday, Oct. 21, 5:07 p.m. — TBS 
Game 5: Mets at Cubs (if necessary) — Thursday, Oct. 22, 5:07 p.m. — TBS 
Game 6: Cubs at Mets (if necessary) — Saturday, Oct. 24, 1:07 p.m.— TBS 
Game 7: Cubs at Mets (if necessary) — Sunday, Oct. 25, 5:07 p.m. — TBS Comment section guidelines The below comment section contains thoughts and opinions from users that in no way represent the views of the Las Vegas Review-Journal or GateHouse Media. This public platform is intended to provide a forum for users of reviewjournal.com to share ideas, express thoughtful opinions and carry the conversation beyond the article. Users must follow the guidelines under our Commenting Policy and are encouraged to use the moderation tools to help maintain civility and keep discussions on topic.
